alert.note: Alert for Charles (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 10 at 1:05AM EST until January 10 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Up to two feet of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...In Maryland, Charles County. In Virginia, Stafford, King George and Central and Southeast Prince William/Manassas/Manassas Park Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST early this morning, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.5 feet, water reaches yards near Cobb Island and docks near Dahlgren. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides up to 3 feet above normal. The next high tide at Aquia Creek is at 5:21 AM. The next high tide at Goose Bay is at 2:41 AM. The next high tide at Indian Head is at 6:35 AM. The next high tide at Dahlgren is at 1:21 AM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Upper Machodoc Creek at Dahlgren MLLW Categories - Minor 3.5 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 7.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 3.1 ft, Major 5.1 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 10/01 AM 4.3 2.4 3.1 1.0 Minor 10/02 PM 3.5 1.6 1.9 0.5 Minor 11/02 AM 2.5 0.6 1.2 0.5 None 11/03 PM 2.6 0.7 1.0 0.5 None 12/03 AM 2.4 0.5 1.0 0.5 None 12/04 PM 3.0 1.1 1.4 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
